message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Thank you for offering the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm and the unique nature of the item. I would like to propose a price of $150 for the product.
I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $160. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, after all!
I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway, but considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $140 for the product.
